column2: "Mma hom mmbu atsɛn
column3: ma wommbu hom atsɛn."

column2: "Na atsɛmbu kor a hom dze bobu no
column3: wɔdze bobu hom; na esusudze kor a hom dze susu no

column2: "Na ɔyɛ dɛn na ehwɛ duaba a ɔwɔ wo nua enyiwa mu
column3: na enndwen mpuna a ɔwɔ wankasa w'enyiwa mu ho?"

column2: "Anaaso ebɛyɛ dɛn ase wo nua dɛ
column3: Ma minyi duaba mfi w'enyiwa mu

column2: "Ɔwo dabrabanyi
column3: dzi kan yi mpuna fi wankasa w'enyiwa mu: nna ibohu yie eyi duaba no efi wo nua enyiwa mu."

column2: "Mma hom mmfa dza no ho tsew no mma nkraman
column3: eso mma hom nntow hom ahondze pa nngu mpreko enyim
column4: amma wɔaammfa hɔn anan enntsiatsia do
column5: na wɔaannsan bio ammbɛtsetsew hom mu."

column2: "Hom mbisa na wɔbɛma hom; hom nhwehwɛ na hom bohu; hom mbɔ mu na wobobue hom:"
"na obiara a obisa no onya; na nyia ɔhwehwɛ no ohu; na nyia ɔbɔ mu no wobobue no."
"Anaaso hom mu woana
column3: na sɛ ne ba bisa no paanoo a

column2: "Anaaso sɛ obisa no esunam a
column3: ɔbɛma no ɔwɔ?"

column2: "Na sɛ hom a hom muo yi nyim mbrɛ hom dze akyɛdze pa ma hom mba a
column3: mpɛn ahen ara na hom Egya a ɔwɔ sor no nnkɛfa ndzɛmba pa ama hɔn a wobisa no?"

column2: "Dɛm ntsi adze biara a hom pɛ dɛ nyimpa yɛ ma hom no
column3: hom nyɛ dɛmara so mma hɔn; na iyi nye mbra no nye nkɔnhyɛfo no."

column2: "Hom nhɛn abow tseaba no mu
column3: na abow a ɔtsɛw
column4: na ɔkwan a ɔyɛ tɛtɛr nye dza wɔdze kɔ ɔsɛɛ mu
column5: na piinara wɔ hɔ a wɔfa mu."

column2: "Na abow a ɔyɛ tseaba na ɔkwan a ɔyɛ heaheaba nye dza wɔdze kɔ nkwa mu
column3: na kumaabi na wohu."

column2: "Hom nhwɛ yie wɔ nkɔnhyɛfo atorfo ho
column3: na wɔba hom nkyɛn wɔ nguannwoma akataho mu

column2: "Hɔn aba na hom dze bohu hɔn. Ana nyimpa tsetsew wenyinaba wɔ nsoɛ do
column3: anaaso adɔmba wɔ kɔkrɔ do?"

column2: "Dɛmara na dua pa ɔsow aba pa; na dua a ɔaprɔw dze
column3: ɔsow aba bɔn."

column2: "Dua pa nntum nnsow aba bɔn
column3: na eso dua a ɔaprɔw nntum nnsow aba pa."

column2: "Dua biara a ɔnnsow aba pa no
column3: wotwa

column2: "Dɛm ntsi hom dze hɔn aba bohu hɔn."
"Nnyɛ obiara a ɔse me dɛ
column3: Ewuradze
column5: na ɔbɔkɔ sor ahenman no mu; na nyia ɔbɛyɛ m'Egya a ɔwɔ sor no ne pɛ a."

column2: "Da no mu no dodowara bɛse me dɛ
column3: Ewuradze
column5: ana yɛammfa wo dzin annhyɛ nkɔm
column6: na yɛammfa wo dzin enntu mbɔnsam
column7: na yɛammfa wo dzin annyɛ tum ndwuma pii?"

column2: "Na aber no
column3: mebɛpaa mu maka akyerɛ hɔn dɛ
column4: Minnyim hom da: hom mfi me nkyɛn nkɔ

column2: "Dɛm ntsi obiara a otsie me nsɛm yi na ɔyɛ no
column3: wɔdze no bosusu badwembanyi a osii ne dan wɔ ɔbotan do no."

column2: "Na nsu tɔree
column3: na nsuyirii bae
column5: ma wɔboor dan no na ɔannhwe ase
column6: osiandɛ wɔtoo ne fapem wɔ ɔbotan do."

column2: "Na obiara a otsie me nsɛm yi na ɔnnyɛ no
column3: wɔdze no bosusu kotobonyi a osii ne dan wɔ anhwea do no ho."

column2: "Na nsu tɔree
column3: na nsuyirii bae
column4: na ehum tui boor dan no

column2: "Na ɔbaa dɛ Jesus wiee nsɛm yi no
column3: ne nkyerɛkyerɛ yɛɛ nyimpadodow no ahobow;"

column2: "osiandɛ ɔkyerɛkyerɛɛ hɔn dɛ nyia ɔwɔ tum
column3: na ɔnntse dɛ akyerɛwfo no."
